snippet: Criminal charges have been announced for two New Jersey state troopers who led a convoy of high-performance vehicles in a dangerous fashion; the most serious charge is for advising participants to cover license plates with tape.
abstract: Criminal charges have been announced for two New Jersey state troopers who led a convoy of high-performance vehicles in a dangerous fashion; the most serious charge is for advising participants to cover license plates with tape.

headline.main: N.J. Troopers Charged in Leading Exotic Car Caravan on Garden State Parkway
